title: The Seaside Family
description: The Caravan Family are spending their summer in beautiful, sandy Sea-Gull Cove. They are staying in their caravans, right at the edge of the sea, and it promises to be the best holiday ever! But poor, miserable Benjy Johns is with them. Will he ruin the children's holiday, or can they cheer Benjy up and help him enjoy the sea and life in a caravan?
author: Enid Blyton
